tool_description: Creates new course entries with academic details, requirements, and basic scheduling parameters for the course catalog system.

course_title.description: Full descriptive name of the course

course_description.description: Detailed course description and learning objectives

error_messages: Duplicate course code: The provided course_code already exists in the system.
Invalid credit hours: credit_hours must be an integer between 1 and 6.
Missing required field: All parameters (course_code, course_title, credit_hours, department, course_description) must be provided.
Invalid department: Department must be a recognized academic department.
usage: Provide course_code, course_title, credit_hours, department, and course_description to create a new course entry. Ensure course_code is unique and credit_hours falls within institutional limits.

creation_status.description: Status of course creation (success, pending, failed)
